original_title: 死ぬほど嫌いな義父の大好物は女子○生のワタシでした… 楓カレン
overview: Karen’s Mom has a new boyfriend, a very unpolished middle-aged guy. And it happens, they are getting married fast.  After he moved to the house, he begins to show his true nature, and his schoolgirl fetish…
title: The Stepfather I Hate like Crazy Loves School Girls like Me... Karen Kaede
